thread.title: The Internet Can't Get Enough of Tiny Trump
thread.title_full: The Internet Can't Get Enough of Tiny Trump

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The Internet Can't Get Enough of Tiny Trump
text:
The internet's new favorite meme is taking trolling to the next level by imagining a world where President Trump's hands aren't the only things considered tiny — and the results are absolutely hilarious.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Thanks to the PhotoShop magic of Reddit, people have begun placing tiny Trumps in various photographs, showing the president going about his normal duties despite being approximately two feet tall. Needless to say, the results are pretty silly — and despite Trump likely not being the biggest fan of the meme, the internet has shown no signs of slowing down anytime soon.
Here are just a few of the most popular tiny Trumps so far, and for more, check out the subreddit /r/TinyTrumps right here .
